attributes.action: Sack Patricia Scotland, the Attorney General
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Attorney General's position is untenable. Having been part of the Government creating the Immigration Law that she has fallen foul of and having admitted that she has done wrong, the public feel that the credibility of this Labour Administration is at stake. 

Patricia Scotland should resign. Patricia Scotland should be sacked by the Prime Minister and to fail to do so shows the Prime Minister to be unworthy of his own office.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
